p: The estimated history of LNV dispersal route over time is shown in detail in Fig.Â 6. According to our results of the phylogeographic analysis, LNV was originated in Australia in the south pacific region and then initially introduced to Liaoning province in China in the Northeast Asia around 1980s.Subsequently, the virus was further westwarded spread to Shanxi province, Qinghai province and Xingjiang province of China during 1990s.
